description: Discontinue Windows fast launch for a Windows AMI, and clean up existing pre-provisioned snapshots. After you disable Windows fast launch, the AMI uses the standard launch process for each new instance. Amazon EC2 must remove all pre-provisioned snapshots before you can enable Windows fast launch again.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the image for which to disable Windows fast launch.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The ID of the image for which Windows fast launch was disabled.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The pre-provisioning resource type that must be cleaned after turning off Windows fast launch for the Windows AMI. Supported values include: snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotConfiguration
nested_items.description: Parameters that were used for Windows fast launch for the Windows AMI before Windows fast launch was disabled. This informs the clean-up process.

nested_items.name: TargetResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of pre-provisioned snapshots requested to keep on hand for a Windows fast launch enabled AMI.

nested_items.name: LaunchTemplate
nested_items.description: The launch template that was used to launch Windows instances from pre-provisioned snapshots.

nested_items.name: LaunchTemplateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the launch template that the AMI uses for Windows fast launch.

nested_items.name: LaunchTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the launch template that the AMI uses for Windows fast launch.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the launch template that the AMI uses for Windows fast launch.

nested_items.name: MaxParallelLaunches
nested_items.description: The maximum number of instances that Amazon EC2 can launch at the same time to create pre-provisioned snapshots for Windows fast launch.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner of the Windows AMI for which Windows fast launch was disabled.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of Windows fast launch for the specified Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: StateTransitionReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the state changed for Windows fast launch for the Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: StateTransitionTime
nested_items.description: The time that the state changed for Windows fast launch for the Windows AMI.
